A

addToInventory(ArrayList<Inventory>) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
Checks the input ID # against the inventory list, if its there, lets the user choose the complete new quantity, if its not there, gathers all the necessary information to add it to the list

C

checkByQuantity(ArrayList<Inventory>) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
Gathers quantity input from user and outputs all items, and their quantities for what is equal too or below that quantity

D

displayInventory(ArrayList<Inventory>) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
Outputs the item inventory while formating it for the user to read easier

G

generateIDNumber() - Method in class Inventory
Uses an array library and a random number generator to create a random 5 character string that it then defines as the ID Number for a given item.

returns category associated with the item

returns that name of a give item
getPrice() - Method in class Inventory

getQuantity() - Method in class Inventory

H

Hardward_Store_Software_Part1 - Class in <Unnamed>
Controls the files modification, menu, all the functions the modify the items on the inventory and inventory itself.

I

Inventory - Class in <Unnamed>
Class to manage and alter all the informations for each individual item in the store inventory.
Inventory() - Constructor for class Inventory
Constructs an Inventory Object that initializes all variables with default values
Inventory(String, String, String, Integer, Double) - Constructor for class Inventory
Constructs an Inventory object that initializes all the values associated with it to the arguments passed to it.
itemSearch(ArrayList<Inventory>) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
Checks through the inventory for any items that match the provided item or partial name to the item, and returns the current on-hands, prices, and ID number.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
Reads in the inventory file, directs the menu, and writes back to the inventory file

R

reduceOnHand(ArrayList<Inventory>) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part1
Asks the item the user would like to reduce the on hand for, Checks that the item is on the inventory list, then allows the user to modify the inventory.

S

defines category as a temp variable c that is passed to it
